lyrics:
64 contributorsmet gala lyricsintro
its easy to slip dont want you to fall
i drip on this bitch like met gala ballin
answer her texts dont answer her calls

chorus

walk in with the drip that met gala ball

this bitch let me fuck this shit went to her brain

in love with my life and you wish we could trade
you might also likechorus

i hit and dont miss aint no win lose or draw
hit and dont miss aint no win lose or draw
came from flat shoals and old nat
on the south in that back you get whacked then get shot in your car
why hell you think that im maxin relaxin in mansions no cappin cause we had it hard

i aint get this bitch off of mackin it came off of actions and fashion and stay in accord
